about_the_game:
First, a great thank to all those who have purchased Touhou Blooming Chaos 2, we really appreciate all of you to support us and the development of this game that we all enjoy.
Due to the huge cast of Touhou, we of course wish to bring everyone’s favorite characters into the game. However, limited by many constraints we are sorry that this is going to be a slow process.
As such, we created this series of DLCs for you to enjoy.
Character Pack 2 is all about the adorable younger sisters of Touhou!
This includes:
  • Flandre Scarlet
  • Komeji Koishi
  • Aki Minoriko
  • Tsukumo Yatsuhashi
  • Yorigami Jyoon
Regardless of the popularity of the characters, we'll always try to fit all sorts of tastes. Have fun!
detailed_description:
First, a great thank to all those who have purchased Touhou Blooming Chaos 2, we really appreciate all of you to support us and the development of this game that we all enjoy.
Due to the huge cast of Touhou, we of course wish to bring everyone’s favorite characters into the game. However, limited by many constraints we are sorry that this is going to be a slow process.
As such, we created this series of DLCs for you to enjoy.
Character Pack 2 is all about the adorable younger sisters of Touhou!
This includes:
  • Flandre Scarlet
  • Komeji Koishi
  • Aki Minoriko
  • Tsukumo Yatsuhashi
  • Yorigami Jyoon
Regardless of the popularity of the characters, we'll always try to fit all sorts of tastes. Have fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD r3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: Intel i3 8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Flandre Scarlet,Komeji Koishi,Aki Minoriko,Tsukumo Yatsuhashi and Yorigami Jyoon. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.
